Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.appointment.AppointmentManager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object
The AppointmentManager class manages appointment scheduling, updating, and cancellation within the system. It handles operations related to patient appointments, including appointment requests, confirmations, rescheduling, and outcomes.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments from appointmentStorageProvider.
      Returns:
      a List of all Appointment objects

    • getAllAppointmentOutcomeRecords

      public List<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getAllAppointmentOutcomeRecords()
      Retrieves all appointment outcome records from appointmentOutcomeStorageProvider.
      Returns:
      a List of all AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects

    • getAppointmentsByPatient

      public ArrayList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByPatient(Patient patient)
      Retrieves appointments from appointmentStorageProvider for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient whose appointments are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Appointment objects for the specified patient

    • getAppointmentsByUUID

      public ArrayList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByUUID(UUID uuid)
      Retrieves appointments from appointmentStorageProvider by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier of the appointment
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Appointment objects matching the specified UUID

    • getAppointmentByID

      public Appointment getAppointmentByID(String id)
      Retrieves appointments from appointmentStorageProvider by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the appointment
      Returns:
      a Appointment object matching the specified UUID

    • getAppointmentsByDoctor

      public ArrayList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDoctor(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves appointments from appointmentStorageProvider for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the Doctor whose appointments are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Appointment objects for the specified doctor

    • getAppointmentsByDoctorAndStatus

      public ArrayList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDoctorAndStatus(Doctor doctor, AppointmentStatus status)
      Retrieves appointments from appointmentStorageProvider for a specific doctor with a specified status.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the Doctor whose appointments are to be retrieved
      status - the status of the appointments to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Appointment objects with the specified status

    • acceptAppointmentRequest

      public void acceptAppointmentRequest(Appointment appointment)
      Confirms an appointment request and updates its status to confirmed. Saves the updated appointments list to the serializable appointments file
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment to be confirmed

    • declineAppointmentRequest

      public void declineAppointmentRequest(Appointment appointment)
      Declines an appointment request and updates its status to cancelled. Saves the updated appointments list to the serializable appointments file
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment to be declined

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment(Patient patient, Availability availability)
      Schedules a new appointment request for a patient with a specified availability. Saves the new appointment to the appointments list managed by appointmentStorageProvider and saves the updated list to the serializable appointments file
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient requesting the appointment
      availability - the Availability details for the appointment

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment(Appointment appointment, Availability newAvailability)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new date and time based on the given newAvailability. Saves the updated appointments list to the serializable appointments file
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment to be rescheduled
      newAvailability - the new Availability for the appointment

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Cancels an existing appointment and updates its status to canceled. Saves the updated appointments list to the serializable appointments file
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment to be canceled

    • completeAppointment

      public void completeAppointment(Appointment appointment, AppointmentOutcomeRecord appointmentOutcomeRecord)
      Marks an appointment as completed and associates an outcome record with it. Saves the updated appointments list to the serializable appointments file Adds a new record to the appointment outcomes list and saves the updated appointment outcomes list to the serializable appointment outcomes file
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment to be completed
      appointmentOutcomeRecord - the AppointmentOutcomeRecord detailing the appointment outcome

    • getAppointmentOutcomeRecordsByPatient

      public List<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getAppointmentOutcomeRecordsByPatient(Patient patient)
      Retrieves outcome records for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient whose outcome records are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a List of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects for the specified patient

    • getAppointmentOutcomeRecordsByUUID

      public AppointmentOutcomeRecord getAppointmentOutcomeRecordsByUUID(UUID appointmentId)
      Retrieves an appointment outcome record by its appointment UUID. This method allows doctors to access the outcome record associated with a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the UUID of the appointment outcome record to retrieve
      Returns:
      the AppointmentOutcomeRecord matching the specified UUID, or null if not found

    • getAppointmentOutcomeRecordsByStatus

      public List<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getAppointmentOutcomeRecordsByStatus(MedicationStatus medicationStatus)
      Retrieves appointment outcome records with a specific medication status. This method allows pharmacists to find and fulfill medication orders based on their status.
      Parameters:
      medicationStatus - the MedicationStatus to filter outcome records by
      Returns:
      a List of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects with the specified medication status

    • updateAppointmentOutcomeRecordMedicationStatus

      public void updateAppointmentOutcomeRecordMedicationStatus(AppointmentOutcomeRecord record, MedicationStatus status)
      Updates the medication status of a specified appointment outcome record. This method is used by pharmacists to update the status of medication orders.
      Parameters:
      record - the AppointmentOutcomeRecord whose medication status is to be updated
      status - the new MedicationStatus to set
